Merge flextable cells vertically

Merge flextable cells vertically when consecutive cells have identical values.

merge_v(x, j = NULL, part = "body")

Arguments

x
flextable object
j
columns names/keys where cells have to be merged.
part
partname of the table where merge has to be done.

Examples

ft_merge <- flextable(mtcars)
ft_merge <- merge_v(ft_merge, j = c("gear", "carb"))
write_docx("ft_merge_v.docx", ft_merge)
#> [1] "/Users/davidgohel/Github/flextable/docs/reference/ft_merge_v.docx"
